amendment.description: Amendments make technical corrections specifying that the OMB Director shall submit reports; delays the effective date for some of the impact analyses which OMB is required to prepare; and exempts any matter relating to monetary policy.
amendment.purpose: Amendments no. 2, 3, and 4 printed in the Congressional Record to make technical corrections specifying that the OMB Director submit the reports; delay application of analyses of impacts on public health and safety, the environment, consumer protection, equal opportunity, and other public policy goals; and exempts any matter relating to monetary policy.

action.text: On agreeing to the McIntosh amendments (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
